body.paragraph: A comparison operator (<) that returns true if the item on the left of the operator is strictly less than the item to the right of the operator. Returns false otherwise.
Most often used to compare two values and subsequently execute or not execute a block of code based on the value of the comparison.

body.example:
a = 1
b = 5
while a < b:
	a += 1
print(a)
print(a)
